SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.POWERSHELL_UTILITY :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_JBOSS_V6.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_JBOSS_V6.PRV.INCLUDE.JBOSS_CLI@WINDOWS :SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_CLI# = &UC4_JBOSS_CLI# $env:NOPAUSE="True"
:IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_OPERATING_MODE# = 'Managed Domain' : IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_PROFILE# = '' : PRINT Profile must not be empty : EXIT 1 : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_QUERY_CMD# = '/profile=&UC4RB_JBOSS_PROFILE#/subsystem=datasources' : SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_COMMAND# = 'data-source --profile=&UC4RB_JBOSS_PROFILE#' : ENDIF :ELSE : SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_QUERY_CMD# = '/subsystem=datasources' : SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_COMMAND# = 'data-source' :ENDIF
! prepare parameters
! decrypt password :SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP#="&UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_PASSWORD#" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD :SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_PASSWORD# = "$UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD"
:SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_PARAMS# = ''
:IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_DRIVER_CLASS# <> '' : SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_PARAMS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_PARAMS#, '--driver-class=&UC4RB_JBOSS_DRIVER_CLASS# ') :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_USERNAME# <> '' : SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_PARAMS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_PARAMS#, '--user-name=&UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_USERNAME# ') :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_PASSWORD# <> '' : SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_PARAMS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_PARAMS#, '--password=&UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_PASSWORD# ') :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_MAX_POOL_SIZE# <> '' : SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_PARAMS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_PARAMS#, '--max-pool-size=&UC4RB_JBOSS_MAX_POOL_SIZE# ') :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_MIN_POOL_SIZE# <> '' : SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_PARAMS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_PARAMS#, '--min-pool-size=&UC4RB_JBOSS_MIN_POOL_SIZE# ') :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_JTA_INTEGRATION# = 'YES' : SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_PARAMS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_PARAMS#, '--jta=true ') :ELSE : SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_PARAMS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_PARAMS#, '--jta=false ') :ENDIF
function FailIfExisting { Write-Host Datasource &UC4RB_JBOSS_NAME# already exists : IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_FAIL_EXISTING# = "YES" exit 1 : ELSE : IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_UPDATE_EXISTING# = 'YES' UpdateIfExisting : ELSE exit 0 : ENDIF : ENDIF }
function UpdateIfExisting { Write-Host Updating datasource &UC4RB_JBOSS_NAME#.. $result = &UC4RB_JBOSS_CLI# --command=":reload"
&UC4RB_JBOSS_CLI# --command="&UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_COMMAND# --name=&UC4RB_JBOSS_NAME# --jndi-name=&UC4RB_JBOSS_JNDI_NAME# --driver-name=&UC4RB_JBOSS_DRIVER_NAME# --connection-url=&UC4RB_JBOSS_URL# &UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_PARAMS#" : INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_POWERSHELL_CMD@WINDOWS
$result = &UC4RB_JBOSS_CLI# --command=":reload"
UpdateConnectionProperties
Write-Host Successfully update datasource &UC4RB_JBOSS_NAME# exit 0 }
function UpdateConnectionProperties { ! update connection properties : IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_PROPERTIES# <> '' : SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_PROPERTIES# = STR_SUB(&UC4RB_JBOSS_PROPERTIES#, '"', '`"') ! parse connection properties $splits = "&UC4RB_JBOSS_PROPERTIES#".split(",") $keys = @() $values = @() for($i=0; $i -lt $splits.length; $i++) { $ele = $splits[$i] $eqlSign = $ele.IndexOf("=") if ($eqlSign -lt 0) { break } $k = $ele.Substring(0, $eqlSign).Trim() if (![bool]$k) { break } $keys += $k $values += $ele.Substring($eqlSign + 1).Trim() }
for ($i=0; $i -lt $keys.length; $i++) { ! add connection properties, notice that existing properties can not be updated $key = $keys[$i] $value = $values[$i] $command = "&UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_QUERY_CMD#/data-source=&UC4RB_JBOSS_NAME#/connection-properties=$key/:add(value=$value)" $result = &UC4RB_JBOSS_CLI# --command="$command" } : ELSE ! do nothing $null : ENDIF }
Write-Host Checking datasource existence..
! check if datasource exists $result = &UC4RB_JBOSS_CLI# --command="&UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_QUERY_CMD#/data-source=&UC4RB_JBOSS_NAME#:read-resource"
$result = $result | select-string -pattern '"outcome" => "success"' -caseSensitive
if ([bool]($result)) { FailIfExisting }
Write-Host Creating new datasource &UC4RB_JBOSS_NAME#..
! create new data source &UC4RB_JBOSS_CLI# --command="&UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_COMMAND# add --name=&UC4RB_JBOSS_NAME# --jndi-name=&UC4RB_JBOSS_JNDI_NAME# --driver-name=&UC4RB_JBOSS_DRIVER_NAME# --connection-url=&UC4RB_JBOSS_URL# &UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_PARAMS#" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_POWERSHELL_CMD@WINDOWS
! re-check sleep 5 $result = &UC4RB_JBOSS_CLI# --command="&UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_QUERY_CMD#/data-source=&UC4RB_JBOSS_NAME#:read-resource"
$result = $result | select-string -pattern '"outcome" => "success"' -caseSensitive
if (![bool]($result)) { Write-Host Create datasource &UC4RB_JBOSS_NAME# finished unsucessfully exit 1 }
$result = &UC4RB_JBOSS_CLI# --command=":reload"
UpdateConnectionProperties
Write-Host Successfully create datasource &UC4RB_JBOSS_NAME#
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_POWERSHELL_CMD@WINDOWS
